00028 // Based on the work of Stefan Gustavson and Ashima Arts on "webgl-noise": 
00029 // https://github.com/ashima/webgl-noise 
00030 // Following Stefan Gustavson's paper "Simplex noise demystified": 
00031 // http://www.itn.liu.se/~stegu/simplexnoise/simplexnoise.pdf
00033 
00034 #include "../geometric.hpp"
00035 #include "../common.hpp"
00036 #include "../vector_relational.hpp"
00037 #include "../detail/_noise.hpp"

00039 namespace glm{
00040 namespace gtc
00041 {
00042         template <typename T, precision P>
00043         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER detail::tvec4<T, P> grad4(T const & j, detail::tvec4<T, P> const & ip)
00044         {
00045                 detail::tvec3<T, P> pXYZ = floor(fract(detail::tvec3<T, P>(j) * detail::tvec3<T, P>(ip)) * T(7)) * ip[2] - T(1);
00046                 T pW = static_cast<T>(1.5) - dot(abs(pXYZ), detail::tvec3<T, P>(1));
00047                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s = detail::tvec4<T, P>(lessThan(detail::tvec4<T, P>(pXYZ, pW), detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0)));
00048                 pXYZ = pXYZ + (detail::tvec3<T, P>(s) * T(2) - T(1)) * s.w; 
00049                 return detail::tvec4<T, P>(pXYZ, pW);
00050         }
00051 }//namespace gtc
00052 
00053         // Classic Perlin noise
00054         template <typename T, precision P>
00055         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Position)
00056         {
00057                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi = glm::floor(detail::tvec4<T, P>(Position.x, Position.y, Position.x, Position.y)) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00058                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf = glm::fract(detail::tvec4<T, P>(Position.x, Position.y, Position.x, Position.y)) - detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00059                 Pi = mod(Pi, detail::tvec4<T, P>(289)); // To avoid truncation effects in permutation
00060                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix(Pi.x, Pi.z, Pi.x, Pi.z);
00061                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy(Pi.y, Pi.y, Pi.w, Pi.w);
00062                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fx(Pf.x, Pf.z, Pf.x, Pf.z);
00063                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fy(Pf.y, Pf.y, Pf.w, Pf.w);
00064 
00065                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00066 
00067                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx = static_cast<T>(2) * glm::fract(i / T(41)) - T(1);
00068                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy = glm::abs(gx) - T(0.5);
00069                 detail::tvec4<T, P> tx = glm::floor(gx + T(0.5));
00070                 gx = gx - tx;
00071 
00072                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g00(gx.x, gy.x);
00073                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g10(gx.y, gy.y);
00074                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g01(gx.z, gy.z);
00075                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g11(gx.w, gy.w);
00076 
00077                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g00, g00), dot(g01, g01), dot(g10, g10), dot(g11, g11)));
00078                 g00 *= norm.x;  
00079                 g01 *= norm.y;  
00080                 g10 *= norm.z;  
00081                 g11 *= norm.w;  
00082 
00083                 T n00 = dot(g00, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.x, fy.x));
00084                 T n10 = dot(g10, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.y, fy.y));
00085                 T n01 = dot(g01, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.z, fy.z));
00086                 T n11 = dot(g11, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.w, fy.w));
00087 
00088                 detail::tvec2<T, P> fade_xy = fade(detail::tvec2<T, P>(Pf.x, Pf.y));
00089                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_x = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n00, n01), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n10, n11), fade_xy.x);
00090                 T n_xy = mix(n_x.x, n_x.y, fade_xy.y);
00091                 return T(2.3) * n_xy;
00092         }
00093 
00094         // Classic Perlin noise
00095         template <typename T, precision P>
00096         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Position)
00097         {
00098                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pi0 = floor(Position); // Integer part for indexing
00099                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pi1 = Pi0 + T(1); // Integer part + 1
00100                 Pi0 = mod289(Pi0);
00101                 Pi1 = mod289(Pi1);
00102                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pf0 = fract(Position); // Fractional part for interpolation
00103                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pf1 = Pf0 - T(1); // Fractional part - 1.0
00104                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix(Pi0.x, Pi1.x, Pi0.x, Pi1.x);
00105                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy = detail::tvec4<T, P>(detail::tvec2<T, P>(Pi0.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(Pi1.y));
00106                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz0(Pi0.z);
00107                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz1(Pi1.z);
00108 
00109                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00110                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy0 = detail::permute(ixy + iz0);
00111                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy1 = detail::permute(ixy + iz1);
00112 
00113                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx0 = ixy0 * T(1.0 / 7.0);
00114                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy0 = fract(floor(gx0) * T(1.0 / 7.0)) - T(0.5);
00115                 gx0 = fract(gx0);
00116                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.5) - abs(gx0) - abs(gy0);
00117                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sz0 = step(gz0, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00118                 gx0 -= sz0 * (step(T(0), gx0) - T(0.5));
00119                 gy0 -= sz0 * (step(T(0), gy0) - T(0.5));
00120 
00121                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx1 = ixy1 * T(1.0 / 7.0);
00122                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy1 = fract(floor(gx1) * T(1.0 / 7.0)) - T(0.5);
00123                 gx1 = fract(gx1);
00124                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz1 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.5) - abs(gx1) - abs(gy1);
00125                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sz1 = step(gz1, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00126                 gx1 -= sz1 * (step(T(0), gx1) - T(0.5));
00127                 gy1 -= sz1 * (step(T(0), gy1) - T(0.5));
00128 
00129                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g000(gx0.x, gy0.x, gz0.x);
00130                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g100(gx0.y, gy0.y, gz0.y);
00131                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g010(gx0.z, gy0.z, gz0.z);
00132                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g110(gx0.w, gy0.w, gz0.w);
00133                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g001(gx1.x, gy1.x, gz1.x);
00134                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g101(gx1.y, gy1.y, gz1.y);
00135                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g011(gx1.z, gy1.z, gz1.z);
00136                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g111(gx1.w, gy1.w, gz1.w);
00137 
00138                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm0 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g000, g000), dot(g010, g010), dot(g100, g100), dot(g110, g110)));
00139                 g000 *= norm0.x;
00140                 g010 *= norm0.y;
00141                 g100 *= norm0.z;
00142                 g110 *= norm0.w;
00143                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm1 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g001, g001), dot(g011, g011), dot(g101, g101), dot(g111, g111)));
00144                 g001 *= norm1.x;
00145                 g011 *= norm1.y;
00146                 g101 *= norm1.z;
00147                 g111 *= norm1.w;
00148 
00149                 T n000 = dot(g000, Pf0);
00150                 T n100 = dot(g100, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z));
00151                 T n010 = dot(g010, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z));
00152                 T n110 = dot(g110, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z));
00153                 T n001 = dot(g001, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z));
00154                 T n101 = dot(g101, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z));
00155                 T n011 = dot(g011, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z));
00156                 T n111 = dot(g111, Pf1);
00157 
00158                 detail::tvec3<T, P> fade_xyz = fade(Pf0);
00159                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_z = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n000, n100, n010, n110), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n001, n101, n011, n111), fade_xyz.z);
00160                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_yz = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_z.x, n_z.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_z.z, n_z.w), fade_xyz.y);
00161                 T n_xyz = mix(n_yz.x, n_yz.y, fade_xyz.x); 
00162                 return T(2.2) * n_xyz;
00163         }

00238         // Classic Perlin noise
00239         template <typename T, precision P>
00240         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & Position)
00241         {
00242                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi0 = floor(Position);      // Integer part for indexing
00243                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi1 = Pi0 + T(1);           // Integer part + 1
00244                 Pi0 = mod(Pi0, detail::tvec4<T, P>(289));
00245                 Pi1 = mod(Pi1, detail::tvec4<T, P>(289));
00246                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf0 = fract(Position);      // Fractional part for interpolation
00247                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf1 = Pf0 - T(1);           // Fractional part - 1.0
00248                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix(Pi0.x, Pi1.x, Pi0.x, Pi1.x);
00249                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy(Pi0.y, Pi0.y, Pi1.y, Pi1.y);
00250                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz0(Pi0.z);
00251                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz1(Pi1.z);
00252                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iw0(Pi0.w);
00253                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iw1(Pi1.w);
00254 
00255                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00256                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy0 = detail::permute(ixy + iz0);
00257                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy1 = detail::permute(ixy + iz1);
00258                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy00 = detail::permute(ixy0 + iw0);
00259                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy01 = detail::permute(ixy0 + iw1);
00260                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy10 = detail::permute(ixy1 + iw0);
00261                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy11 = detail::permute(ixy1 + iw1);
00262 
00263                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx00 = ixy00 / T(7);
00264                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy00 = floor(gx00) / T(7);
00265                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz00 = floor(gy00) / T(6);
00266                 gx00 = fract(gx00) - T(0.5);
00267                 gy00 = fract(gy00) - T(0.5);
00268                 gz00 = fract(gz00) - T(0.5);
00269                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw00 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx00) - abs(gy00) - abs(gz00);
00270                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw00 = step(gw00, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00271                 gx00 -= sw00 * (step(T(0), gx00) - T(0.5));
00272                 gy00 -= sw00 * (step(T(0), gy00) - T(0.5));
00273 
00274                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx01 = ixy01 / T(7);
00275                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy01 = floor(gx01) / T(7);
00276                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz01 = floor(gy01) / T(6);
00277                 gx01 = fract(gx01) - T(0.5);
00278                 gy01 = fract(gy01) - T(0.5);
00279                 gz01 = fract(gz01) - T(0.5);
00280                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw01 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx01) - abs(gy01) - abs(gz01);
00281                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw01 = step(gw01, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00282                 gx01 -= sw01 * (step(T(0), gx01) - T(0.5));
00283                 gy01 -= sw01 * (step(T(0), gy01) - T(0.5));
00284 
00285                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx10 = ixy10 / T(7);
00286                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy10 = floor(gx10) / T(7);
00287                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz10 = floor(gy10) / T(6);
00288                 gx10 = fract(gx10) - T(0.5);
00289                 gy10 = fract(gy10) - T(0.5);
00290                 gz10 = fract(gz10) - T(0.5);
00291                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw10 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx10) - abs(gy10) - abs(gz10);
00292                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw10 = step(gw10, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0));
00293                 gx10 -= sw10 * (step(T(0), gx10) - T(0.5));
00294                 gy10 -= sw10 * (step(T(0), gy10) - T(0.5));
00295 
00296                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx11 = ixy11 / T(7);
00297                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy11 = floor(gx11) / T(7);
00298                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz11 = floor(gy11) / T(6);
00299                 gx11 = fract(gx11) - T(0.5);
00300                 gy11 = fract(gy11) - T(0.5);
00301                 gz11 = fract(gz11) - T(0.5);
00302                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw11 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx11) - abs(gy11) - abs(gz11);
00303                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw11 = step(gw11, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00304                 gx11 -= sw11 * (step(T(0), gx11) - T(0.5));
00305                 gy11 -= sw11 * (step(T(0), gy11) - T(0.5));
00306 
00307                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0000(gx00.x, gy00.x, gz00.x, gw00.x);
00308                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1000(gx00.y, gy00.y, gz00.y, gw00.y);
00309                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0100(gx00.z, gy00.z, gz00.z, gw00.z);
00310                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1100(gx00.w, gy00.w, gz00.w, gw00.w);
00311                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0010(gx10.x, gy10.x, gz10.x, gw10.x);
00312                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1010(gx10.y, gy10.y, gz10.y, gw10.y);
00313                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0110(gx10.z, gy10.z, gz10.z, gw10.z);
00314                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1110(gx10.w, gy10.w, gz10.w, gw10.w);
00315                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0001(gx01.x, gy01.x, gz01.x, gw01.x);
00316                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1001(gx01.y, gy01.y, gz01.y, gw01.y);
00317                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0101(gx01.z, gy01.z, gz01.z, gw01.z);
00318                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1101(gx01.w, gy01.w, gz01.w, gw01.w);
00319                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0011(gx11.x, gy11.x, gz11.x, gw11.x);
00320                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1011(gx11.y, gy11.y, gz11.y, gw11.y);
00321                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0111(gx11.z, gy11.z, gz11.z, gw11.z);
00322                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1111(gx11.w, gy11.w, gz11.w, gw11.w);
00323 
00324                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm00 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0000, g0000), dot(g0100, g0100), dot(g1000, g1000), dot(g1100, g1100)));
00325                 g0000 *= norm00.x;
00326                 g0100 *= norm00.y;
00327                 g1000 *= norm00.z;
00328                 g1100 *= norm00.w;
00329 
00330                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm01 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0001, g0001), dot(g0101, g0101), dot(g1001, g1001), dot(g1101, g1101)));
00331                 g0001 *= norm01.x;
00332                 g0101 *= norm01.y;
00333                 g1001 *= norm01.z;
00334                 g1101 *= norm01.w;
00335 
00336                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm10 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0010, g0010), dot(g0110, g0110), dot(g1010, g1010), dot(g1110, g1110)));
00337                 g0010 *= norm10.x;
00338                 g0110 *= norm10.y;
00339                 g1010 *= norm10.z;
00340                 g1110 *= norm10.w;
00341 
00342                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm11 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0011, g0011), dot(g0111, g0111), dot(g1011, g1011), dot(g1111, g1111)));
00343                 g0011 *= norm11.x;
00344                 g0111 *= norm11.y;
00345                 g1011 *= norm11.z;
00346                 g1111 *= norm11.w;
00347 
00348                 T n0000 = dot(g0000, Pf0);
00349                 T n1000 = dot(g1000, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00350                 T n0100 = dot(g0100, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00351                 T n1100 = dot(g1100, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00352                 T n0010 = dot(g0010, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00353                 T n1010 = dot(g1010, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00354                 T n0110 = dot(g0110, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00355                 T n1110 = dot(g1110, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00356                 T n0001 = dot(g0001, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00357                 T n1001 = dot(g1001, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00358                 T n0101 = dot(g0101, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00359                 T n1101 = dot(g1101, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00360                 T n0011 = dot(g0011, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00361                 T n1011 = dot(g1011, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00362                 T n0111 = dot(g0111, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00363                 T n1111 = dot(g1111, Pf1);
00364 
00365                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fade_xyzw = fade(Pf0);
00366                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_0w = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0000, n1000, n0100, n1100), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0001, n1001, n0101, n1101), fade_xyzw.w);
00367                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_1w = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0010, n1010, n0110, n1110), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0011, n1011, n0111, n1111), fade_xyzw.w);
00368                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_zw = mix(n_0w, n_1w, fade_xyzw.z);
00369                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_yzw = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_zw.x, n_zw.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_zw.z, n_zw.w), fade_xyzw.y);
00370                 T n_xyzw = mix(n_yzw.x, n_yzw.y, fade_xyzw.x);
00371                 return T(2.2) * n_xyzw;
00372         }
00373 
00374         // Classic Perlin noise, periodic variant
00375         template <typename T, precision P>
00376         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec2<T, P> const & Position, detail::tvec2<T, P> const & rep)
00377         {
00378                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi = floor(detail::tvec4<T, P>(Position.x, Position.y, Position.x, Position.y)) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00379                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf = fract(detail::tvec4<T, P>(Position.x, Position.y, Position.x, Position.y)) - detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00380                 Pi = mod(Pi, detail::tvec4<T, P>(rep.x, rep.y, rep.x, rep.y)); // To create noise with explicit period
00381                 Pi = mod(Pi, detail::tvec4<T, P>(289)); // To avoid truncation effects in permutation
00382                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix(Pi.x, Pi.z, Pi.x, Pi.z);
00383                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy(Pi.y, Pi.y, Pi.w, Pi.w);
00384                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fx(Pf.x, Pf.z, Pf.x, Pf.z);
00385                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fy(Pf.y, Pf.y, Pf.w, Pf.w);
00386 
00387                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00388 
00389                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx = static_cast<T>(2) * fract(i / T(41)) - T(1);
00390                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy = abs(gx) - T(0.5);
00391                 detail::tvec4<T, P> tx = floor(gx + T(0.5));
00392                 gx = gx - tx;
00393 
00394                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g00(gx.x, gy.x);
00395                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g10(gx.y, gy.y);
00396                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g01(gx.z, gy.z);
00397                 detail::tvec2<T, P> g11(gx.w, gy.w);
00398 
00399                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g00, g00), dot(g01, g01), dot(g10, g10), dot(g11, g11)));
00400                 g00 *= norm.x;
00401                 g01 *= norm.y;
00402                 g10 *= norm.z;
00403                 g11 *= norm.w;
00404 
00405                 T n00 = dot(g00, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.x, fy.x));
00406                 T n10 = dot(g10, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.y, fy.y));
00407                 T n01 = dot(g01, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.z, fy.z));
00408                 T n11 = dot(g11, detail::tvec2<T, P>(fx.w, fy.w));
00409 
00410                 detail::tvec2<T, P> fade_xy = fade(detail::tvec2<T, P>(Pf.x, Pf.y));
00411                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_x = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n00, n01), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n10, n11), fade_xy.x);
00412                 T n_xy = mix(n_x.x, n_x.y, fade_xy.y);
00413                 return T(2.3) * n_xy;
00414         }
00415 
00416         // Classic Perlin noise, periodic variant
00417         template <typename T, precision P>
00418         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & Position, detail::tvec3<T, P> const & rep)
00419         {
00420                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pi0 = mod(floor(Position), rep); // Integer part, modulo period
00421                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pi1 = mod(Pi0 + detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(1)), rep); // Integer part + 1, mod period
00422                 Pi0 = mod(Pi0, detail::tvec3<T, P>(289));
00423                 Pi1 = mod(Pi1, detail::tvec3<T, P>(289));
00424                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pf0 = fract(Position); // Fractional part for interpolation
00425                 detail::tvec3<T, P> Pf1 = Pf0 - detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(1)); // Fractional part - 1.0
00426                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix = detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pi0.x, Pi1.x, Pi0.x, Pi1.x);
00427                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy = detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pi0.y, Pi0.y, Pi1.y, Pi1.y);
00428                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz0(Pi0.z);
00429                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz1(Pi1.z);
00430 
00431                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00432                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy0 = detail::permute(ixy + iz0);
00433                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy1 = detail::permute(ixy + iz1);
00434 
00435                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx0 = ixy0 / T(7);
00436                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy0 = fract(floor(gx0) / T(7)) - T(0.5);
00437                 gx0 = fract(gx0);
00438                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.5) - abs(gx0) - abs(gy0);
00439                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sz0 = step(gz0, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0));
00440                 gx0 -= sz0 * (step(T(0), gx0) - T(0.5));
00441                 gy0 -= sz0 * (step(T(0), gy0) - T(0.5));
00442 
00443                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx1 = ixy1 / T(7);
00444                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy1 = fract(floor(gx1) / T(7)) - T(0.5);
00445                 gx1 = fract(gx1);
00446                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz1 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.5) - abs(gx1) - abs(gy1);
00447                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sz1 = step(gz1, detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0)));
00448                 gx1 -= sz1 * (step(T(0), gx1) - T(0.5));
00449                 gy1 -= sz1 * (step(T(0), gy1) - T(0.5));
00450 
00451                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g000 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx0.x, gy0.x, gz0.x);
00452                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g100 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx0.y, gy0.y, gz0.y);
00453                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g010 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx0.z, gy0.z, gz0.z);
00454                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g110 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx0.w, gy0.w, gz0.w);
00455                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g001 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx1.x, gy1.x, gz1.x);
00456                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g101 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx1.y, gy1.y, gz1.y);
00457                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g011 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx1.z, gy1.z, gz1.z);
00458                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g111 = detail::tvec3<T, P>(gx1.w, gy1.w, gz1.w);
00459 
00460                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm0 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g000, g000), dot(g010, g010), dot(g100, g100), dot(g110, g110)));
00461                 g000 *= norm0.x;
00462                 g010 *= norm0.y;
00463                 g100 *= norm0.z;
00464                 g110 *= norm0.w;
00465                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm1 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g001, g001), dot(g011, g011), dot(g101, g101), dot(g111, g111)));
00466                 g001 *= norm1.x;
00467                 g011 *= norm1.y;
00468                 g101 *= norm1.z;
00469                 g111 *= norm1.w;
00470 
00471                 T n000 = dot(g000, Pf0);
00472                 T n100 = dot(g100, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z));
00473                 T n010 = dot(g010, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z));
00474                 T n110 = dot(g110, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z));
00475                 T n001 = dot(g001, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z));
00476                 T n101 = dot(g101, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z));
00477                 T n011 = dot(g011, detail::tvec3<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z));
00478                 T n111 = dot(g111, Pf1);
00479 
00480                 detail::tvec3<T, P> fade_xyz = fade(Pf0);
00481                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_z = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n000, n100, n010, n110), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n001, n101, n011, n111), fade_xyz.z);
00482                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_yz = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_z.x, n_z.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_z.z, n_z.w), fade_xyz.y);
00483                 T n_xyz = mix(n_yz.x, n_yz.y, fade_xyz.x);
00484                 return T(2.2) * n_xyz;
00485         }
00486 
00487         // Classic Perlin noise, periodic version
00488         template <typename T, precision P>
00489         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T perlin(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & Position, detail::tvec4<T, P> const & rep)
00490         {
00491                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi0 = mod(floor(Position), rep); // Integer part modulo rep
00492                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pi1 = mod(Pi0 + T(1), rep); // Integer part + 1 mod rep
00493                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf0 = fract(Position); // Fractional part for interpolation
00494                 detail::tvec4<T, P> Pf1 = Pf0 - T(1); // Fractional part - 1.0
00495                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ix = detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pi0.x, Pi1.x, Pi0.x, Pi1.x);
00496                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iy = detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pi0.y, Pi0.y, Pi1.y, Pi1.y);
00497                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz0(Pi0.z);
00498                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iz1(Pi1.z);
00499                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iw0(Pi0.w);
00500                 detail::tvec4<T, P> iw1(Pi1.w);
00501 
00502                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy = detail::permute(detail::permute(ix) + iy);
00503                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy0 = detail::permute(ixy + iz0);
00504                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy1 = detail::permute(ixy + iz1);
00505                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy00 = detail::permute(ixy0 + iw0);
00506                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy01 = detail::permute(ixy0 + iw1);
00507                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy10 = detail::permute(ixy1 + iw0);
00508                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ixy11 = detail::permute(ixy1 + iw1);
00509 
00510                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx00 = ixy00 / T(7);
00511                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy00 = floor(gx00) / T(7);
00512                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz00 = floor(gy00) / T(6);
00513                 gx00 = fract(gx00) - T(0.5);
00514                 gy00 = fract(gy00) - T(0.5);
00515                 gz00 = fract(gz00) - T(0.5);
00516                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw00 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx00) - abs(gy00) - abs(gz00);
00517                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw00 = step(gw00, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0));
00518                 gx00 -= sw00 * (step(T(0), gx00) - T(0.5));
00519                 gy00 -= sw00 * (step(T(0), gy00) - T(0.5));
00520 
00521                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx01 = ixy01 / T(7);
00522                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy01 = floor(gx01) / T(7);
00523                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz01 = floor(gy01) / T(6);
00524                 gx01 = fract(gx01) - T(0.5);
00525                 gy01 = fract(gy01) - T(0.5);
00526                 gz01 = fract(gz01) - T(0.5);
00527                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw01 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx01) - abs(gy01) - abs(gz01);
00528                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw01 = step(gw01, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00529                 gx01 -= sw01 * (step(T(0), gx01) - T(0.5));
00530                 gy01 -= sw01 * (step(T(0), gy01) - T(0.5));
00531 
00532                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx10 = ixy10 / T(7);
00533                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy10 = floor(gx10) / T(7);
00534                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz10 = floor(gy10) / T(6);
00535                 gx10 = fract(gx10) - T(0.5);
00536                 gy10 = fract(gy10) - T(0.5);
00537                 gz10 = fract(gz10) - T(0.5);
00538                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw10 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx10) - abs(gy10) - abs(gz10);
00539                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw10 = step(gw10, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0));
00540                 gx10 -= sw10 * (step(T(0), gx10) - T(0.5));
00541                 gy10 -= sw10 * (step(T(0), gy10) - T(0.5));
00542 
00543                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gx11 = ixy11 / T(7);
00544                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gy11 = floor(gx11) / T(7);
00545                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gz11 = floor(gy11) / T(6);
00546                 gx11 = fract(gx11) - T(0.5);
00547                 gy11 = fract(gy11) - T(0.5);
00548                 gz11 = fract(gz11) - T(0.5);
00549                 detail::tvec4<T, P> gw11 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.75) - abs(gx11) - abs(gy11) - abs(gz11);
00550                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sw11 = step(gw11, detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0)));
00551                 gx11 -= sw11 * (step(T(0), gx11) - T(0.5));
00552                 gy11 -= sw11 * (step(T(0), gy11) - T(0.5));
00553 
00554                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0000(gx00.x, gy00.x, gz00.x, gw00.x);
00555                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1000(gx00.y, gy00.y, gz00.y, gw00.y);
00556                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0100(gx00.z, gy00.z, gz00.z, gw00.z);
00557                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1100(gx00.w, gy00.w, gz00.w, gw00.w);
00558                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0010(gx10.x, gy10.x, gz10.x, gw10.x);
00559                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1010(gx10.y, gy10.y, gz10.y, gw10.y);
00560                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0110(gx10.z, gy10.z, gz10.z, gw10.z);
00561                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1110(gx10.w, gy10.w, gz10.w, gw10.w);
00562                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0001(gx01.x, gy01.x, gz01.x, gw01.x);
00563                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1001(gx01.y, gy01.y, gz01.y, gw01.y);
00564                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0101(gx01.z, gy01.z, gz01.z, gw01.z);
00565                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1101(gx01.w, gy01.w, gz01.w, gw01.w);
00566                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0011(gx11.x, gy11.x, gz11.x, gw11.x);
00567                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1011(gx11.y, gy11.y, gz11.y, gw11.y);
00568                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g0111(gx11.z, gy11.z, gz11.z, gw11.z);
00569                 detail::tvec4<T, P> g1111(gx11.w, gy11.w, gz11.w, gw11.w);
00570 
00571                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm00 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0000, g0000), dot(g0100, g0100), dot(g1000, g1000), dot(g1100, g1100)));
00572                 g0000 *= norm00.x;
00573                 g0100 *= norm00.y;
00574                 g1000 *= norm00.z;
00575                 g1100 *= norm00.w;
00576 
00577                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm01 = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0001, g0001), dot(g0101, g0101), dot(g1001, g1001), dot(g1101, g1101)));
00578                 g0001 *= norm01.x;
00579                 g0101 *= norm01.y;
00580                 g1001 *= norm01.z;
00581                 g1101 *= norm01.w;
00582 
00583                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm10 = taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0010, g0010), dot(g0110, g0110), dot(g1010, g1010), dot(g1110, g1110)));
00584                 g0010 *= norm10.x;
00585                 g0110 *= norm10.y;
00586                 g1010 *= norm10.z;
00587                 g1110 *= norm10.w;
00588 
00589                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm11 = taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(g0011, g0011), dot(g0111, g0111), dot(g1011, g1011), dot(g1111, g1111)));
00590                 g0011 *= norm11.x;
00591                 g0111 *= norm11.y;
00592                 g1011 *= norm11.z;
00593                 g1111 *= norm11.w;
00594 
00595                 T n0000 = dot(g0000, Pf0);
00596                 T n1000 = dot(g1000, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00597                 T n0100 = dot(g0100, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00598                 T n1100 = dot(g1100, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf0.w));
00599                 T n0010 = dot(g0010, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00600                 T n1010 = dot(g1010, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00601                 T n0110 = dot(g0110, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00602                 T n1110 = dot(g1110, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf0.w));
00603                 T n0001 = dot(g0001, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00604                 T n1001 = dot(g1001, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00605                 T n0101 = dot(g0101, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00606                 T n1101 = dot(g1101, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf1.y, Pf0.z, Pf1.w));
00607                 T n0011 = dot(g0011, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00608                 T n1011 = dot(g1011, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf1.x, Pf0.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00609                 T n0111 = dot(g0111, detail::tvec4<T, P>(Pf0.x, Pf1.y, Pf1.z, Pf1.w));
00610                 T n1111 = dot(g1111, Pf1);
00611 
00612                 detail::tvec4<T, P> fade_xyzw = fade(Pf0);
00613                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_0w = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0000, n1000, n0100, n1100), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0001, n1001, n0101, n1101), fade_xyzw.w);
00614                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_1w = mix(detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0010, n1010, n0110, n1110), detail::tvec4<T, P>(n0011, n1011, n0111, n1111), fade_xyzw.w);
00615                 detail::tvec4<T, P> n_zw = mix(n_0w, n_1w, fade_xyzw.z);
00616                 detail::tvec2<T, P> n_yzw = mix(detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_zw.x, n_zw.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(n_zw.z, n_zw.w), fade_xyzw.y);
00617                 T n_xyzw = mix(n_yzw.x, n_yzw.y, fade_xyzw.x);
00618                 return T(2.2) * n_xyzw;
00619         }
00620 
00621         template <typename T, precision P>
00622         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T simplex(glm::detail::tvec2<T, P> const & v)
00623         {
00624                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const C = detail::tvec4<T, P>(
00625                         T( 0.211324865405187),  // (3.0 -  sqrt(3.0)) / 6.0
00626                         T( 0.366025403784439),  //  0.5 * (sqrt(3.0)  - 1.0)
00627                         T(-0.577350269189626),  // -1.0 + 2.0 * C.x
00628                         T( 0.024390243902439)); //  1.0 / 41.0
00629 
00630                 // First corner
00631                 detail::tvec2<T, P> i  = floor(v + dot(v, detail::tvec2<T, P>(C[1])));
00632                 detail::tvec2<T, P> x0 = v -   i + dot(i, detail::tvec2<T, P>(C[0]));
00633 
00634                 // Other corners
00635                 //i1.x = step( x0.y, x0.x ); // x0.x > x0.y ? 1.0 : 0.0
00636                 //i1.y = 1.0 - i1.x;
00637                 detail::tvec2<T, P> i1 = (x0.x > x0.y) ? detail::tvec2<T, P>(1, 0) : detail::tvec2<T, P>(0, 1);
00638                 // x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xx ;
00639                 // x1 = x0 - i1 + 1.0 * C.xx ;
00640                 // x2 = x0 - 1.0 + 2.0 * C.xx ;
00641                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x12 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(x0.x, x0.y, x0.x, x0.y) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(C.x, C.x, C.z, C.z);
00642                 x12 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12) - i1, x12.z, x12.w);
00643 
00644                 // Permutations
00645                 i = mod(i, detail::tvec2<T, P>(289)); // Avoid truncation effects in permutation
00646                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p = detail::permute(
00647                         detail::permute(i.y + detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(0), i1.y, T(1)))
00648                         + i.x + detail::tvec3<T, P>(T(0), i1.x, T(1)));
00649 
00650                 detail::tvec3<T, P> m = max(detail::tvec3<T, P>(0.5) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(
00651                         dot(x0, x0),
00652                         dot(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.x, x12.y), detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.x, x12.y)), 
00653                         dot(detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.z, x12.w), detail::tvec2<T, P>(x12.z, x12.w))), detail::tvec3<T, P>(0));
00654                 m = m * m ;
00655                 m = m * m ;
00656 
00657                 // Gradients: 41 points uniformly over a line, mapped onto a diamond.
00658                 // The ring size 17*17 = 289 is close to a multiple of 41 (41*7 = 287)
00659 
00660                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x = static_cast<T>(2) * fract(p * C.w) - T(1);
00661                 detail::tvec3<T, P> h = abs(x) - T(0.5);
00662                 detail::tvec3<T, P> ox = floor(x + T(0.5));
00663                 detail::tvec3<T, P> a0 = x - ox;
00664 
00665                 // Normalise gradients implicitly by scaling m
00666                 // Inlined for speed: m *= taylorInvSqrt( a0*a0 + h*h );
00667                 m *= static_cast<T>(1.79284291400159) - T(0.85373472095314) * (a0 * a0 + h * h);
00668 
00669                 // Compute final noise value at P
00670                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g;
00671                 g.x  = a0.x  * x0.x  + h.x  * x0.y;
00672                 //g.yz = a0.yz * x12.xz + h.yz * x12.yw;
00673                 g.y = a0.y * x12.x + h.y * x12.y;
00674                 g.z = a0.z * x12.z + h.z * x12.w;
00675                 return T(130) * dot(m, g);
00676         }
00677 
00678         template <typename T, precision P>
00679         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T simplex(detail::tvec3<T, P> const & v)
00680         {
00681                 detail::tvec2<T, P> const C(1.0 / 6.0, 1.0 / 3.0);
00682                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const D(0.0, 0.5, 1.0, 2.0);
00683 
00684                 // First corner
00685                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i(floor(v + dot(v, detail::tvec3<T, P>(C.y))));
00686                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x0(v - i + dot(i, detail::tvec3<T, P>(C.x)));
00687 
00688                 // Other corners
00689                 detail::tvec3<T, P> g(step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.z, x0.x), x0));
00690                 detail::tvec3<T, P> l(T(1) - g);
00691                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i1(min(g, detail::tvec3<T, P>(l.z, l.x, l.y)));
00692                 detail::tvec3<T, P> i2(max(g, detail::tvec3<T, P>(l.z, l.x, l.y)));
00693 
00694                 //   x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xxx;
00695                 //   x1 = x0 - i1  + 1.0 * C.xxx;
00696                 //   x2 = x0 - i2  + 2.0 * C.xxx;
00697                 //   x3 = x0 - 1.0 + 3.0 * C.xxx;
00698                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x1(x0 - i1 + C.x);
00699                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x2(x0 - i2 + C.y); // 2.0*C.x = 1/3 = C.y
00700                 detail::tvec3<T, P> x3(x0 - D.y);      // -1.0+3.0*C.x = -0.5 = -D.y
00701 
00702                 // Permutations
00703                 i = mod289(i); 
00704                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(
00705                         i.z + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.z, i2.z, T(1))) +
00706                         i.y + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.y, i2.y, T(1))) +
00707                         i.x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(0), i1.x, i2.x, T(1))));
00708 
00709                 // Gradients: 7x7 points over a square, mapped onto an octahedron.
00710                 // The ring size 17*17 = 289 is close to a multiple of 49 (49*6 = 294)
00711                 T n_ = static_cast<T>(0.142857142857); // 1.0/7.0
00712                 detail::tvec3<T, P> ns(n_ * detail::tvec3<T, P>(D.w, D.y, D.z) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(D.x, D.z, D.x));
00713 
00714                 detail::tvec4<T, P> j(p - T(49) * floor(p * ns.z * ns.z));  //  mod(p,7*7)
00715 
00716                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x_(floor(j * ns.z));
00717                 detail::tvec4<T, P> y_(floor(j - T(7) * x_));    // mod(j,N)
00718 
00719                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x(x_ * ns.x + ns.y);
00720                 detail::tvec4<T, P> y(y_ * ns.x + ns.y);
00721                 detail::tvec4<T, P> h(T(1) - abs(x) - abs(y));
00722 
00723                 detail::tvec4<T, P> b0(x.x, x.y, y.x, y.y);
00724                 detail::tvec4<T, P> b1(x.z, x.w, y.z, y.w);
00725 
00726                 // vec4 s0 = vec4(lessThan(b0,0.0))*2.0 - 1.0;
00727                 // vec4 s1 = vec4(lessThan(b1,0.0))*2.0 - 1.0;
00728                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s0(floor(b0) * T(2) + T(1));
00729                 detail::tvec4<T, P> s1(floor(b1) * T(2) + T(1));
00730                 detail::tvec4<T, P> sh(-step(h, detail::tvec4<T, P>(0.0)));
00731 
00732                 detail::tvec4<T, P> a0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(b0.x, b0.z, b0.y, b0.w) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(s0.x, s0.z, s0.y, s0.w) * detail::tvec4<T, P>(sh.x, sh.x, sh.y, sh.y);
00733                 detail::tvec4<T, P> a1 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(b1.x, b1.z, b1.y, b1.w) + detail::tvec4<T, P>(s1.x, s1.z, s1.y, s1.w) * detail::tvec4<T, P>(sh.z, sh.z, sh.w, sh.w);
00734 
00735                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p0(a0.x, a0.y, h.x);
00736                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p1(a0.z, a0.w, h.y);
00737                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p2(a1.x, a1.y, h.z);
00738                 detail::tvec3<T, P> p3(a1.z, a1.w, h.w);
00739 
00740                 // Normalise gradients
00741                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, p0), dot(p1, p1), dot(p2, p2), dot(p3, p3)));
00742                 p0 *= norm.x;
00743                 p1 *= norm.y;
00744                 p2 *= norm.z;
00745                 p3 *= norm.w;
00746 
00747                 // Mix final noise value
00748                 detail::tvec4<T, P> m = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(x0, x0), dot(x1, x1), dot(x2, x2), dot(x3, x3)), detail::tvec4<T, P>(0));
00749                 m = m * m;
00750                 return T(42) * dot(m * m, detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, x0), dot(p1, x1), dot(p2, x2), dot(p3, x3)));
00751         }
00752 
00753         template <typename T, precision P>
00754         GLM_FUNC_QUALIFIER T simplex(detail::tvec4<T, P> const & v)
00755         {
00756                 detail::tvec4<T, P> const C(
00757                         0.138196601125011,  // (5 - sqrt(5))/20  G4
00758                         0.276393202250021,  // 2 * G4
00759                         0.414589803375032,  // 3 * G4
00760                         -0.447213595499958); // -1 + 4 * G4
00761 
00762                 // (sqrt(5) - 1)/4 = F4, used once below
00763                 T const F4 = static_cast<T>(0.309016994374947451);
00764 
00765                 // First corner
00766                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i  = floor(v + dot(v, vec4(F4)));
00767                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x0 = v -   i + dot(i, vec4(C.x));
00768 
00769                 // Other corners
00770 
00771                 // Rank sorting originally contributed by Bill Licea-Kane, AMD (formerly ATI)
00772                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i0;
00773                 detail::tvec3<T, P> isX = step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.z, x0.w), detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.x));
00774                 detail::tvec3<T, P> isYZ = step(detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.z, x0.w, x0.w), detail::tvec3<T, P>(x0.y, x0.y, x0.z));
00775                 //  i0.x = dot(isX, vec3(1.0));
00776                 //i0.x = isX.x + isX.y + isX.z;
00777                 //i0.yzw = static_cast<T>(1) - isX;
00778                 i0 = detail::tvec4<T, P>(isX.x + isX.y + isX.z, T(1) - isX);
00779                 //  i0.y += dot(isYZ.xy, vec2(1.0));
00780                 i0.y += isYZ.x + isYZ.y;
00781                 //i0.zw += 1.0 - detail::tvec2<T, P>(isYZ.x, isYZ.y);
00782                 i0.z += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.x;
00783                 i0.w += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.y;
00784                 i0.z += isYZ.z;
00785                 i0.w += static_cast<T>(1) - isYZ.z;
00786 
00787                 // i0 now contains the unique values 0,1,2,3 in each channel
00788                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i3 = clamp(i0, T(0), T(1));
00789                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i2 = clamp(i0 - T(1), T(0), T(1));
00790                 detail::tvec4<T, P> i1 = clamp(i0 - T(2), T(0), T(1));
00791 
00792                 //  x0 = x0 - 0.0 + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00793                 //  x1 = x0 - i1  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00794                 //  x2 = x0 - i2  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00795                 //  x3 = x0 - i3  + 0.0 * C.xxxx
00796                 //  x4 = x0 - 1.0 + 4.0 * C.xxxx
00797                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x1 = x0 - i1 + C.x;
00798                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x2 = x0 - i2 + C.y;
00799                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x3 = x0 - i3 + C.z;
00800                 detail::tvec4<T, P> x4 = x0 + C.w;
00801 
00802                 // Permutations
00803                 i = mod(i, detail::tvec4<T, P>(289)); 
00804                 T j0 = detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(i.w) + i.z) + i.y) + i.x);
00805                 detail::tvec4<T, P> j1 = detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(detail::permute(
00806                         i.w + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.w, i2.w, i3.w, T(1))) +
00807                         i.z + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.z, i2.z, i3.z, T(1))) +
00808                         i.y + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.y, i2.y, i3.y, T(1))) +
00809                         i.x + detail::tvec4<T, P>(i1.x, i2.x, i3.x, T(1)));
00810 
00811                 // Gradients: 7x7x6 points over a cube, mapped onto a 4-cross polytope
00812                 // 7*7*6 = 294, which is close to the ring size 17*17 = 289.
00813                 detail::tvec4<T, P> ip = detail::tvec4<T, P>(T(1) / T(294), T(1) / T(49), T(1) / T(7), T(0));
00814 
00815                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p0 = gtc::grad4(j0,   ip);
00816                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p1 = gtc::grad4(j1.x, ip);
00817                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p2 = gtc::grad4(j1.y, ip);
00818                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p3 = gtc::grad4(j1.z, ip);
00819                 detail::tvec4<T, P> p4 = gtc::grad4(j1.w, ip);
00820 
00821                 // Normalise gradients
00822                 detail::tvec4<T, P> norm = detail::taylorInvSqrt(detail::tvec4<T, P>(dot(p0, p0), dot(p1, p1), dot(p2, p2), dot(p3, p3)));
00823                 p0 *= norm.x;
00824                 p1 *= norm.y;
00825                 p2 *= norm.z;
00826                 p3 *= norm.w;
00827                 p4 *= detail::taylorInvSqrt(dot(p4, p4));
00828 
00829                 // Mix contributions from the five corners
00830                 detail::tvec3<T, P> m0 = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec3<T, P>(dot(x0, x0), dot(x1, x1), dot(x2, x2)), detail::tvec3<T, P>(0));
00831                 detail::tvec2<T, P> m1 = max(T(0.6) - detail::tvec2<T, P>(dot(x3, x3), dot(x4, x4)             ), detail::tvec2<T, P>(0));
00832                 m0 = m0 * m0;
00833                 m1 = m1 * m1;
00834                 return T(49) * 
00835                         (dot(m0 * m0, detail::tvec3<T, P>(dot(p0, x0), dot(p1, x1), dot(p2, x2))) + 
00836                         dot(m1 * m1, detail::tvec2<T, P>(dot(p3, x3), dot(p4, x4))));
00837         }
00838 }//namespace glm
